titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller Archive Center Oral History and Audio Recordings Collection
A Guide to the Rockefeller Archive Center Oral History and Audio Recordings Collection FA1444

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-01 03:33:30 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Archive Center Oral History and Audio Recordings Collection

physdesc.extent: 36 audio recordings, and 5 letter document boxes.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains audio recordings of oral histories and interviews, as well as documentation of the interviews, and associated supplementary material.
Types of documentation and supplementary material include:
Transcript: A verbatim script of the interview.
Catalogue: A point by point list of topics covered in the interview.
Account: A narrative, non-verbatim write up of the interview.

Notes: Supplementary material which can include biographical and background information on the interviewee, a list of questions used in the interview, correspondence regarding the interview, drafts of the transcript, and a release form signed by the interviewee.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in six series as follows:
Series 2: Additional Rockefeller Family Audio Recordings
Series 3: Interviews and Oral History - Paper Files
Series 4: Interviews and Oral History - Microfiche

did.unittitle: Chasin, Laura Rockefeller -- Reading Her Notes from Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Mauze Interview

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, New York. Laura Rockefeller Chasin reading, at length, her notes from a conversation she conducted with her aunt Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Mauze. The recording may have been made for transcription purposes. Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Mauze is not on the recording.

did.unittitle: What's Happening - Channel 3 - Hartford, Connecticut: Topic: "The National Caucus of Labor Committees"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Popular music, random television sound, and silence for first 13 minutes. Recording with various members and ex-members from the The National Caucus of Labor Committees (NCLC) and other political opponents stating their disatisfaction with the Rockefellers.
Appears to be multiple programs.
